content: of each block s final round your yarn requirements may change if you vary too much from the measurements given with mc single_crochet around the outer edge of the blanket working 4 single_crochet into each ch2 corner space weave in yarn ends as you finish each block or a few at a time future you will thank past you weave in ends block lightly if necessary all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 2/14/25 © fairmount fibers ltd 2025 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
